dependencies.description: Autoconf -- system configuration part of autotools
dependencies.name: autoconf

dependencies.description: Automake -- make file builder part of autotools
dependencies.name: automake

dependencies.description:
The NVIDIA HPC SDK is a comprehensive suite of compilers, libraries and
tools essential to maximizing developer productivity and the performance
and portability of HPC applications. The NVIDIA HPC SDK C, C++, and
Fortran compilers support GPU acceleration of HPC modeling and
simulation applications with standard C++ and Fortran, OpenACC
directives, and CUDA. GPU-accelerated math libraries maximize
performance on common HPC algorithms, and optimized communications
libraries enable standards-based multi-GPU and scalable systems
programming. Performance profiling and debugging tools simplify porting
and optimization of HPC applications.
dependencies.name: c

dependencies.description:
GNU Make is a tool which controls the generation of executables and
other non-source files of a program from the program's source files.
dependencies.name: gmake

dependencies.description:
The GNU config.guess and config.sub scripts versioned by timestamp.
This package can be used as a build dependency for autotools packages
that ship a tarball with outdated config.guess and config.sub files.
dependencies.name: gnuconfig

dependencies.description: libtool -- library building part of autotools.
dependencies.name: libtool

dependencies.description: GNU M4 is an implementation of the traditional Unix macro processor.
dependencies.name: m4

dependencies.description:
Perl 5 is a highly capable, feature-rich programming language with over
27 years of development.
dependencies.name: perl

dependent_to.description:
This is the Cyrus SASL API implementation. It can be used on the client
or server side to provide authentication and authorization services.
dependent_to.name: cyrus-sasl

dependent_to.description: Linux PAM (Pluggable Authentication Modules for Linux) project.
dependent_to.name: linux-pam

dependent_to.description:
OpenLDAP Software is an open source implementation of the Lightweight
Directory Access Protocol. The suite includes: slapd - stand-alone LDAP
daemon (server) libraries implementing the LDAP protocol, and utilities,
tools, and sample clients.
dependent_to.name: openldap

dependent_to.description:
OpenSSH is the premier connectivity tool for remote login with the SSH
protocol. It encrypts all traffic to eliminate eavesdropping, connection
hijacking, and other attacks. In addition, OpenSSH provides a large
suite of secure tunneling capabilities, several authentication methods,
and sophisticated configuration options.
dependent_to.name: openssh

dependent_to.description:
Tcsh is an enhanced but completely compatible version of csh, the C
shell. Tcsh is a command language interpreter which can be used both as
an interactive login shell and as a shell script command processor. Tcsh
includes a command line editor, programmable word completion, spelling
correction, a history mechanism, job control and a C language like
syntax.
dependent_to.name: tcsh

dependent_to.description: Util-linux is a suite of essential utilities for any Linux system.
dependent_to.name: util-linux

description: libxcrypt is a modern library for one-way hashing of passwords.
name: libxcrypt

variants.description: Build systems supported by the package
variants.name: build_system
